content: about knit from the bottom up this sweet lacey hat was made with a gorgeous rustic farm yarn consisting of gotland wool and silk this feminine yet sturdy hat has subtle lace features and is perfect for both running errands in town or adventuring in the forest if you d like your hat to be slouchy simply knit the lace stitch pattern an extra round or two yarn grand view farm yarn 1 2 skeins of 3 ply 80% gotland wool + 20% silk dk wt 150 yds/137 m in natural color jagger this beautiful rustic vermont farm yarn can be found at www grandviewfarmvt com
